targets.expr:
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_used_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_used_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"})

max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_logical_used_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_logical_used_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"})

max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_referenced_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_referenced_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"})

max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_quota_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_quota_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"})

max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_referenced_quota_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_volume_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_referenced_quota_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_volume_size_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"})

max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_written_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_written_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"})

max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_referenced_reservation_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_referenced_reservation_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"})

max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_available_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset"})
or
max by(pool, name, type) (zfs_dataset_available_bytes{instance=~"$instance", pool=~"$pool", name=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"})
sum(delta(zfs_dataset_logical_referenced_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / $__rate_interval_ms

sum(delta(zfs_dataset_logical_referenced_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / $__rate_interval_ms

panels.description:
When quota is not set, this is expected to be empty.
Volumes without discard can have "volume" value artificially high.

targets.expr:
max(
max_over_time(zfs_dataset_referenced_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval])
/
(max_over_time(zfs_dataset_quota_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval]) != 0)
)

max(
max_over_time(zfs_dataset_referenced_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval])
/
(max_over_time(zfs_dataset_referenced_quota_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval]) != 0)
)

max(
max_over_time(zfs_dataset_used_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval])
/
(max_over_time(zfs_dataset_quota_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval]) != 0)
)

max(
max by(instance, pool) (max_over_time(zfs_dataset_used_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval]))
/ on(instance, pool)
max by(instance, pool) (max_over_time(zfs_pool_size_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool"}[$__interval]))
)

# using zfs_dataset_logical_used_bytes here because volumes run out of space when allocated, regardless of compressed size
max(
max_over_time(zfs_dataset_logical_used_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval])
/
max_over_time(zfs_dataset_volume_size_bytes{instance="$instance", pool=~"$pool", type=~"$type", name=~"$dataset"}[$__interval])
)

panels.title: Used %

targets.expr: sum by(dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nread{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nread{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nwritten{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nwritten{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nread{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000
sum(rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nread{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000
sum by(dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nwritten{instance=~"$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000
sum(rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nwritten{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval])) * $__interval_ms / 1000
sum by(dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_reads{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_reads{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum by(dataset) (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_writes{instance=~"$instance", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_writes{instance=~"$instance", dataset=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval]))

sum by(dataset) (
  rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nread{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval])
  /
  (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_reads{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-6)
)

avg(
  rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nread{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval])
  /
  (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_reads{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-6)
)

sum by(dataset) (
  rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nwritten{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval])
  /
  (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_writes{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset"}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-6)
)

sum(
  rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_nwritten{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval])
  /
  (rate(node_zfs_zpool_dataset_writes{instance="$instance", zpool=~"$pool", dataset=~"$dataset/.*", invalid=~"$enable_children"}[$__rate_interval]) + 1e-6)
)
